greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: row n lists nonzero quadratic residues modulo the n-th term of A123239.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Quadratic Residue.
example: Modulo A123239(3)=11, the quadratic residues are 1,3,4,5,9.
results.author: _A.K. Devaraj_, Oct 20 2009
